page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Over the last 10 years crime has risen.Burglary and theft are the most common.Men are 10 times more likely to commit crimes than women.The number of young offenders is rising-under 20's 7,646-through boredom and unemployment SURVEY RESULTS 75% wanted more police on the beat as their job was more difficult.80% said the police do a good job.90% felt that punishments were to light and 75% want the return of capital punishment for murder and terrorism.Crime rate is influenced by:70% said T.V.:30% unemployment:45% lack of respect and discipline in home and society:40% greed. SOLUTIONS TO LAWLESSNESS 90% wanted more police:85% stiffer punishments:80% more discipline.On most crimes 100% detection rate.
